author: Staff Reporter
text:
Dalits, Christians and Muslims, who were facing constant threat under the Modi government, would be protected only by the Congress party, said All India Congress Committee (AICC) observer for minorities Shaik Mastan Vali here on Wednesday.

Addressing a meeting organised by the minorities wing of the DCC (Kanyakumari West), Mr. Shaik Mastan Vali said that it was the Congress party that got people the freedom of speech, freedom to wear any food and freedom of choice of food. But that freedom had now come under threat.

May 16 Assembly election would be a warning bell for the Modi government, he said.

The meeting was attended by Aslam Basha, president of minorities wing of the Tamil Nadu Congress Committee.
title: “Minorities under constant threat”
